# Support

Thank you for using the Postcrossing Tracker! If you need help, please follow these guidelines.

## Getting Help

### 1. Check the Documentation
Before opening an issue, please review the existing documentation:
- [README.md](../README.md) - General overview and setup.
- [USER_GUIDE.md](../docs/USER_GUIDE.md) - How to use the application.
- [CONFIGURATION.md](../docs/CONFIGURATION.md) - Available settings and environment variables.

### 2. Search Existing Issues
Your question might have already been answered. Check the [GitHub Issues](../../issues) for similar topics.

### 3. Open a Support Issue
If you can't find the answer, please [open a new issue](../../issues/new). 
- Use a descriptive title.
- Provide as much context as possible.
- Include screenshots or error messages if applicable.

## Security Issues
If you have found a security vulnerability, please refer to our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) and do not open a public issue.
